recommended_degree: Desain Grafis, Desain Komunikasi Visual, Pendidikan Vokasional Desain Fashion (Sarjana)
job_description:
- Assist in creating visual materials for marketing campaigns, social media, website, in-store promotions, and digital advertisements.
- Design layouts, banners, posters, digital assets, product visuals, and other brand-related content.
- Support the creative team in brainstorming ideas and developing visual concepts aligned with brand identity.
- Edit and retouch product photos or campaign images when required.
- Ensure all visual outputs follow brand guidelines and maintain quality standards.
- Work closely with Marketing, Social Media, Advertising & Promotion, and other relevant teams.
- Manage design files, assets, and digital archives in an organized manner.
- Perform other design-related tasks assigned by the team.
